mapper.select: SELECT i.app_item_id AS itemId, i.item_name AS itemName, i.price, i.picture, i.item_unit AS itemUnit, i.item_category_id AS itemCategoryId, s.is_pouch AS isPouch, s.support_value AS supportValue, s.support_scope AS supportScope, s.support_money AS supportMoney, s.quantity, s.app_shopping_id AS shoppingId, s.first FROM app_shopping s LEFT JOIN app_item i ON s.item_id = i.app_item_id WHERE s.user_id = #{userId}
